Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that helps people communicate over long distances using sound.
The student can show how the design uses materials to send or receive messages between two people.
The student can represent how the string telephone works to let people talk from far away.
The student can illustrate the importance of the string in transmitting sound from one end to the other.
The student can include features of the design that show how sound travels through the device.
